org.emocha.model
Class DBAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.emocha.model.DBAdapter

public class DBAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

DBAdapter represents the internal database stored in smartphone. DBAdapter stores all the information patients filled, including forms and media files.
